column5: My buddy lost his outdoors card and can't get through on the phone number that is on the website. it just rings and rings no matter how long he sits there. He tried logging in to his account but you need your outdoors card number to do that. He tried to start a new account but it won't let him. Any suggestions?
Should be able to login with email address and use the forgot password if they don't remember. Just need to know what email account they used. https://www.huntandfishontario.com/
Thanks JD. I'll forward this info to him.
Outdoor card number on previous license? Sent from my SM-X200 using Tapatalk
